item.heronecklace.hero_necklace: Hero of the Village Necklace I
item.heronecklace.shero_necklace: Hero of the Village Necklace II
item.heronecklace.ahero_necklace: Hero of the Village Necklace III
item.heronecklace.phero_necklace: Hero of the Village Necklace IV
item.heronecklace.rhero_necklace: Hero of the Village Necklace V
item.heronecklace.hero_trimmed_emerald: A powerful Emerald to craft into a Hero of the Village Necklace.
item.heronecklace.hero_trimmed_sapphire: A powerful Sapphire to craft into a Hero of the Village Necklace II.
item.heronecklace.hero_trimmed_amethyst: A powerful Amethyst to craft into a Hero of the Village Necklace III.
item.heronecklace.hero_trimmed_pinkspine: A powerful Pink Spinel to craft into a Hero of the Village Necklace IV.
item.heronecklace.hero_trimmed_ruby: A powerful Ruby to craft into a Hero of the Village Necklace V.
effect.heronecklace.sapphire_effect: Effect given to all players when Bad Omen II is used to enable the Sapphire Gem as a drop for 45 minutes from Pillagers, Ravagers and Evokers.
effect.heronecklace.amethyst_effect: Effect given to all players when Bad Omen III is used to enable the Amethyst Gem as a drop for 45 minutes from Pillagers, Ravagers and Evokers.
effect.heronecklace.pinkspinel_effect: Effect given to all players when Bad Omen IV is used to enable the Pink Spinel Gem as a drop for 45 minutes from Pillagers, Ravagers and Evokers.
effect.heronecklace.ruby_effect: Effect given to all players when Bad Omen V is used to enable the Ruby Gem as a drop for 45 minutes from Pillagers, Ravagers and Evokers.
